    • Constructor Detail

      • MessagePayload

        public MessagePayload()
        Construct a new MessagePayload with hostname being the short hostname of this machine, level unknown, service name "undefined" and empty message

      • MessagePayload

        public MessagePayload(boolean useLocalHostname)
        Construct a new MessagePayload with level unknown, service name "undefined" and empty message
        Parameters:
        useLocalHostname - - set hostname to be the local hostname of this machine, otherwise will be set to "UNKNOWN";

      • MessagePayload

        public MessagePayload(String hostname,
                      Level level,
                      String serviceName,
                      String message)
        Construct a new MessagePayload
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname to be sent in this passive check
        level - the level
        serviceName - the service name
        message - the message

    • Method Detail

      • getHostname

        public String getHostname()
        The hostname to be sent in this passive check
        Returns:
        the hostname, defaults to "localhost"

      • useLocalHostname

        public void useLocalHostname()
        Use the short hostname of this machine in the passive check

      • setHostname

        public void setHostname(boolean useCanonical)
        Set the hostname in the passive check
        Parameters:
        useCanonical - true to use this machines fully qualified domain name, false to use the short hostname

      • setHostname

        public void setHostname(String hostname)
        Set the hostname in the passive check
        Parameters:
        hostname - the hostname to use

      • getLevel

        public Level getLevel()
        Get the level of the Passive check
        Returns:
        the level

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(String level)
        Set the level of the Passive check using a String The case of the String is ignored
        Parameters:
        level - either "ok", "warning", "critical" or "unknown"

      • setLevel

        public void setLevel(Level level)
        Set the level of the Passive check
        Parameters:
        level - the level

      • getServiceName

        public String getServiceName()
        The service name of this passive check
        Returns:
        the service name, default is "UNDEFINED"
